title: I Hate School So Much

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assign someone homework at night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immunity
- The first time you are executed, you declare that class is in session, revealing yourself as I Hate School So Much and surviving the execution.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4715
*What was that? You wanted time at home to do what you want? Too bad. Have 80 pages of homework.*
